results.description:
Calling all Naturalistas living in Switzerland! Do you or your loved ones have naturally curly hair, dreadlocks, twists, or any mix of coils & kinks? Do you often find yourself wishing for straight, easy to manage hair? Or maybe you're thinking of transitioning from chemically treated hair to your natural hair texture? If you answered yes, then this group is for you! 

This group is for anyone living in Switzerland who is interested in managing their natural kinks, curls, coils, locs & twists beautifully and affordably. I moved to Switzerland from California in 2011, and I've found it difficult to find products and professional stylists who deal with natural curly-textured hair. I decided to form this group as a way to socialize and meet with folks living in Switzerland who may have a similar problem and have had to be "creative" to manage their natural hair. My two daughters are biracial and managing their wild curls with what's available here has been an adventure:)! So, if you're not curly-haired yourself but have children who are, then please join also--you're welcome!

Although I'm based in Zurich, this group is open to all Naturalistas in Switzerland. If you're based in another city then please join and consider being an admin of the group to manage events in your city.

I'll arrange events every 3 months and we'll cover hair management topics. We can review products & styles, share ideas and support one another. We'll also have 'CurlsNightOut', our regular, fun, networking events . Join us and we look forward to meeting you at an event soon!
~Esther

topics.name: How to Maintain your Natural Hair in Winter Time
Keeping a Professional Image with Natural Hair

results.description:
This is a group for anyone willing to improve their communication and leadership skills, understand verbal and non-verbal communication, learn about the power of a constructive feedback, work on different business and self-development systems and tools, and through that boost their own personal growth and bring their businesses and/or careers to a next level. As it is said by Lee Iaccoca, "You can have brilliant ideas, but if you can't get them across, your ideas won't get you anywhere."

As a Meetup member there are two ways to benefit from this group:

1. You have discounts in our workshops, seminars, events, and coaching programs.

2. Becoming part of our Top Notch Toastmasters Zurich club and develop your communication and leadership skills at your own pace in a friendly and international environment.

However, to be part of our TNT Zurich Toastmasters club there are two requirements, as we are ready to give you our support to boost your skills. We expect you:

1. Speak a good level of English. Our TNT Zurich meetings are tailored to help you to develop your communication and leadership skills. It is not an environment to "practice the English language".

2. Your commitment to the TNT Zurich club by attending the meeting regularly and being supportive to the fellow members.

You are welcome to visit our TNT Zurich Club to learn more about us, our meetings, our program. A member of our TNT team will be happy to assist you.

To know more about TNT Zurich club click the link and sign up for a guest in one of our weekly events.

Welcome, and looking forward to meeting you soon.

T.N.T Zurich Group

Please note this group will organize its events either in English, Portuguese and Spanish depending on the day! Pick the one that suits you best!

results.description:
This is a group for people interested in hiking and skiing/snowboarding - mostly at a medium or high level. 

Mountains are a beautiful place to be, and to enjoy them together makes it even better! 

There are some rules:

• Please update your RSVP status, should your plans change. For an organizer it's important to know who is really joining.

• normally hikes and events will be without dogs; in case dogs are welcome, it will be explicitly written in the event description.

• if a payment is required, the payment method will be stated in the event description - or will be sent to you in a private message (in case of multi-day events).

• The activities in this group have a higher risk than sitting on the couch at home. Obviously this goes for sport activities such as skiing/snowboarding and mountain hiking, but it might go for things like for example hot wood stoves in the middle of a mountain hut, etc.. You are always responsible for assessing the risks yourself and you are always responsible for your own do’s and don’ts. You are yourself liable for the consequences of your own decisions. No insurance is provided on behalf of the organizer; please arrange a (travel) insurance yourself and make sure that it covers the appropriate risks (for example: are winter sports activities covered? This is not always the case).
results.name: Hiking, Skiing, Snowboarding, Culture & Eating

results.description:
Zurich meditators offers a variety of meditations and teachings on how the ancient wisdom of Buddha can be applied today in this modern troubled world. 

All our classes include a simple meditation to calm our mind, followed by a teaching and a meditation to get a personal experience of the topic. 

Everyone can attend our classes, independent of age or religion, the Kadampa Meditation Center is open to anyone.

You do not need to bring anything, you can sit either on a chair or on a meditation cushion on the floor. After the class, people sit together with tea and snacks to discuss the meditation subject or just to hang out together - it is a very informal and warm hearted atmosphere.

Events: 

• Every Wednesday 19h30: Meditation classes on "Understanding the Mind"

• Once a month we hava a special event either a day or a weekend course

• Auch haben wir jede Woche Meditationen und Kurse auf Deutsch


for more information, please visit: www.kadampa.ch

or like us on facebook: www.facebook.com/KMCSchweiz


About meditaton:

The purpose of meditation is to cultivate those states of mind that are conducive to peace and well-being.

Meditation is all about the question, where can happiness be found? Happiness is a state of mind, therefore the real source of happiness lies in the mind, not in external circumstances.
If our mind is pure and peaceful we will be happy, regardless of our external conditions, but if it is impure and unpeaceful, we will never find happiness, no matter how much we try to change our external conditions.
The method to make our mind pure and peaceful is to train in meditation.
results.name: Zurich meditators - Buddhas wisdom for this modern

results.description:
Google Developer Group (GDG) Zürich is a developer community aimed at Google developer technology, for developers by developers.  

We are an open community where people meet like minded people and share experiences. Our community is open to all developers. The main focus of the community is Google's developer technology; everything from Android, App Engine, and Google Chrome platforms, to product APIs like the Maps API, YouTube API and Google Calendar API. 

We meet monthly to talk about recent developments in Google technologies. The kind of meetups we do vary from just meeting for beer, to having presentations and hackatons to share practical knowledge.

You can also find us on Google+ https://plus.google.com/communities/107142112628085156329

GDG Zürich is an independent group; our activities and the opinions are not related to Google, the corporation.
